alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:05PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 145 PM MST... At 105 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Estrella Sailport, or 23 miles south of Avondale, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Estrella Sailport, Rainbow Valley and Mobile. This includes AZ Route 238 between mile markers 25 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee
